thread.title: Pablo Zabaleta ready to call time on Manchester City and listen to other offers
thread.title_full: Pablo Zabaleta ready to call time on Manchester City and listen to other offers

author: gsweet
title: Pablo Zabaleta ready to call time on Manchester City and listen to other offers
text:
JUST CALL ME PABGO Pablo Zabaleta ready to call time on Manchester City and listen to other offers 
Inter Milan could be on the cards if Argentinian defender is unable to agree terms to stay at the Etihad By Mike McGrath Comments PABLO ZABALETA will decide his Manchester City future after listening to other offers. 
The Etihad favourite, 32, has made 25 appearances this term but is out of contract in May and has hinted at only staying on the right terms. Reuters 5 Pablo Zabaleta…could be leaving the Etihad 
Zabaleta said: “I am not getting any younger so I need to make sure that my decision is the correct decision. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
“I want to be honest with the club, with myself, with everyone. 
“If I decide that it is time to move on, I will move on. A few clubs were interested to sign me in the summer.” Reuters Zabaleta tangles with Huddersfield’s George Bunn Reuters 5 Zabaleta puts the block on Huddersfield attacker Phillip Billing 
The Argentine ace joined City from Spanish club Espanyol back in 2008. He could land a long-term deal elsewhere, with Inter Milan interested. Most popular YOU'RE STILL MY LION HART Gareth Southgate jets to Turin to tell Joe Hart in person he is still a key man for England THIERRY HENRY Mauricio Pochettino has Tottenham focused on more than just beating Arsenal BRAVO KEEPER SWEEPERS Pep Guardiola reveals his keeper blueprint and calls Claudio Bravo a 'masterpiece' WILL TOPS CITY LIST Manchester City eye £115million triple swoop for William Carvalho, Ryan Bertrand and Ben Gibson in the summer Joel’s De Gea-dryer treatment Joel Robles reveals how old pal David De Gea has inspired him to become No1 MOUR TO MY GAME Marcus Rashford thanks Jose Mourinho for making him a more complete player at Manchester United Zabaleta added: “I said to Pep Guardiola, when we sat down face to face, that last season I was struggling with injuries and I couldn’t reach my top performance.
“But I have been available to play every single game this season, and I’m not injured at all.” Reuters Zabalata celebrates a goal with City new boy Jesus Gabriel PA:Press Association Sign here, please…but we may not see Zabaleta at City much longer 
Meanwhile, Zabaleta City’s players will rally round under-fire keeper Claudio Bravo. Manchester City 5-1 Huddersfield : Aguero double helps fire City into quarters 
Said Zabaleta: "We know Claudio, it's difficult when you come to England — it’s a different league. 
"We are a team, we support each other. We know exactly what he can do for the team. Sunday Premier League match preview featuring Tottenham v Everton 
"We know how good he is and sometimes it is just about confidence. 
"His distribution with the ball has been really good against Huddersfield."
